text:
@toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock So we have the Army involved, so you think that without @MattHancock it would better. Every Minister is working tirelessly to achieve the best outcomes possible 

I find YOU guilty of failing to achieve the standard of journalism I expect are you going to resign ?
